thread.title: This Parrot Sings 'The Monster' Like Rihanna
thread.title_full: This Parrot Sings 'The Monster' Like Rihanna

author: jay@dailydot.com (Jay Hathaway)
title: This Parrot Sings 'The Monster' Like Rihanna
text:
Screengrab via Edilson Barros/YouTube (Public Domain) BTW 
Parrots are so adept at mimicking human language that their name is a synonym for it. But not just any bird can parrot Rihanna , one of the most talented pop stars working today. Here's one parrot who can, though, and some people are even claiming it's better than the real thing: This bird hit notes Rihanna misses üòç https://t.co/d1dXQVfa3G ‚Äî A-YO (@JonMcVie) February 18, 2017 
This impressive Amazon parrot belongs to Edilson Barros of Sao Paulo, Brazil, who originally posted the video to YouTube in March 2016: A year later, Rihanna parrot has suddenly started blowing up on Twitter, possibly as a result of this tweet: esse video do papagaio cantando monster da rihanna √© o melhor video que ir√° ver hoje pic.twitter.com/ciJ50S3A3Z ‚Äî em (@jelenasreal) February 16, 2017 
It got even better when someone edited the bird's singing into the original video for The Monster: RiRi has yet to comment on her new avian rival. We already know how she feels about imitators , though.
